survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with In-Car Voice Assistant Systems Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on their experience with in-car voice assistant systems, including ease of use, functionality, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the in-car voice assistant system?
questions.client_notes: This question helps understand usage frequency. Consider using a radio button for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How often do you use the in-car voice assistant system?

questions.question_text: Which of the following tasks do you primarily use the in-car voice assistant for? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1
questions.client_notes: This question identifies common use cases. Checkboxes are suitable for multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following tasks do you primarily use the in-car voice assistant for? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of voice recognition in your car's voice assistant system?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1
questions.client_notes: This question gauges satisfaction with a key feature. Use a radio button for single-choice responses.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of voice recognition in your car's voice assistant system?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your car's voice assistant system?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question allows for detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for comprehensive responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your car's voice assistant system?

questions.question_text: Overall, how would you rate your experience with your car's voice assistant system?
questions.client_notes: This question provides an overall satisfaction rating. A radio button is recommended for single-choice selection.
